001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import com.google.gson.Gson;
005import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
006import dagger.Module;
007import dagger.Provides;
008import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
009import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
010import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.R;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Game;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service.JataLongPollServiceProxy;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service.JataServiceProxy;
015import java.time.Duration;
016import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
017import javax.inject.Singleton;
018import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
019import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
020import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level;
021import retrofit2.Retrofit;
022import retrofit2.adapter.rxjava3.RxJava3CallAdapterFactory;
023import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;
024
025/**
026 * Provides Hilt with proxies and annotations giving Hilt information about how they need to be
027 * built.
028 */
029@Module
030@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
031public final class JataModule {
032
033  JataModule() {
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Creates a single instance of {@link JataServiceProxy}.
038   *
039   * @param context Global information across the application.
040   * @return {@link JataServiceProxy} instance.
041   */
042  @Provides
043  @Singleton
044  public JataServiceProxy provideProxy(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
045    Gson gson = new GsonBuilder()
046        .excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation()
047        .create();
048    HttpLoggingInterceptor interceptor = new HttpLoggingInterceptor();
049    interceptor.setLevel(Level.valueOf(context.getString(R.string.log_level)));
050    OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
051        .addInterceptor(interceptor)
052        .build();
053    Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
054        .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
055        .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJava3CallAdapterFactory.create())
056        .client(client)
057        .baseUrl(context.getString(R.string.base_url))
058        .build();
059    return retrofit.create(JataServiceProxy.class);
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Creates a single instance of {@link JataLongPollServiceProxy} and sets a request timeout.
064   *
065   * @param context The global information about the application environment
066   * @return {@link JataLongPollServiceProxy} instance.
067   */
068  @Provides
069  @Singleton
070  public JataLongPollServiceProxy provideLongPollProxy(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
071    Gson gson = new GsonBuilder()
072        .excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation()
073        .create();
074    HttpLoggingInterceptor interceptor = new HttpLoggingInterceptor();
075    interceptor.setLevel(Level.valueOf(context.getString(R.string.log_level)));
076    OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
077        .addInterceptor(interceptor)
078        .readTimeout(Duration.ZERO)
079        .callTimeout(30, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
080        .build();
081    Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
082        .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
083        .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJava3CallAdapterFactory.create())
084        .client(client)
085        .baseUrl(context.getString(R.string.base_url))
086        .build();
087    return retrofit.create(JataLongPollServiceProxy.class);
088  }
089
090
091}
